```{r library, message=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)

```

```{r data}

agencies <- read.csv("agencies.csv")
launches <- read.csv("launches.csv")

```

state_names <- levels(launches$state_code)
